dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HRES 311 RH: Dismissing the election contest relating to the office of Representative from the Thirtieth Congressional District of Texas.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Steil, from the Committee on House Administration, reported the following resolution; which was referred to the House Calendar and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: Dismissing the election contest relating to the office of Representative from the Thirtieth Congressional District of Texas.

section.text: That the election contest relating to the office of Representative from the Thirtieth Congressional District of Texas is dismissed on the grounds of untimely filing with the House of Representatives.

endorsement.action-desc: Referred to the House Calendar and ordered to be printed
